actions.text: Referred to Joint Committee on Atomic Energy.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations to the Nuclear Regulatory Commission in accordance with section 261 of the Atomic Energy Act of 1954, as amended, and section 305 of the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974.

summary.text: Authorizes the appropriation of $219,935,000 for fiscal year 1976 and $217,000,000 for fiscal year 1977 to the Nuclear Regulatory Commission to carry out the provisions of the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 and the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations to the Nuclear Regulatory Commission in accordance with section 261 of the Atomic Energy Act of 1954, as amended, and section 305 of the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974.
